nodes.bodyText: Looks like you've added these files to fork-choice-tests resources and eth-reference-tests resources.  Should these ref-test files be deleted?
Yep, the ones in eth-reference-tests should be deleted. Good catch.
Looks like these changes to the eth-reference-tests dependencies are no longer necessary either.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -2,13 +2,19 @@ jar { enabled = false }
 
 dependencies {
   referenceTestImplementation project(':bls')
+  referenceTestImplementation project(':data')
   referenceTestImplementation project(':ethereum:core')
   referenceTestImplementation project(':ethereum:datastructures')
+  referenceTestImplementation project(':ethereum:statetransition')
   referenceTestImplementation project(':eth-tests')
+  referenceTestImplementation project(':protoarray')
   referenceTestImplementation project(':ssz')
   referenceTestImplementation project(':storage')
+  referenceTestImplementation project(':infrastructure:async')
   referenceTestImplementation project(':util')
 
+  referenceTestImplementation testFixtures(project(':storage'))
